entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Morris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:37 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Emerson 10:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: ENE 25 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
